main event: A large fireball with rays of light was observed for about 5 minutes in Klamath Falls, Oregon on October 2, 1964.
interesting points: The object was bright with a dark color, Observed at an estimated distance of about 1 mile, The object faded gradually after about 5 minutes, The object flew from west to northwest on a straight course, No trail or exhaust or sound was noted during the observation.
sighted object: large fireball with rays of light extending downward
